titles: An ordinance of the Lords and Commons in Parliament assembled giving Sir Tho. Fairfax power to prest men in all townes, and places where his army shall march. And to continue for the space of one moneth.
author: England and Wales. Parliament.
notes: Order to print dated: 10. Junii. 1645 and signed: Hen. Elsynge, Cler. Parl. D. Com.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Fairfax, Thomas, --  Baron, 1612-1671 --  Early works to 1800.
